actions.text: On agreeing to the Napolitano amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A044) offered by Mrs. Napolitano to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mrs. Napolitano to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Napolitano amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment changes the degradation standard of an HOV lane from maintaining an average operating speed above 45 mph over a consecutive 180-day period during peak hours from 90% of the time to 50% of the time.
purpose: An amendment No. 45 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to change the degradation standard of an HOV lane from maintaining an average operating speed above 45 mph over a consecutive 180-day period during peak hours from 90% of the time to 50% of the time.
